dc_description_s: This point shapefile represents Miscellaneous Industrial Minerals Operations of New York State for 2001. This data set includes miscellaneous industrial minerals operations in the United States. The data represent commodities covered by the Minerals Information Team (MIT) of the U.S. Geological Survey. The mineral operations are plants and/or mines considered active in 1997, or in 2001 for fullers earth and kaolin, and surveyed by the MIT. This file is an update of the 1998 data set. These data are intended for geographic display and analysis at the national level, and for large regional areas. The data should be displayed and analyzed at scales appropriate for 1:2,000,000-scale data. No responsibility is assumed by the U.S. Geological Survey in the use of these data.
dc_title_s: Miscellaneous Industrial Minerals Operations, New York State, 2001
dct_spatial_sm: New York State, New York, United States
